projects.name: Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: RL project where multiple agents learn the fastest way to reach a coordinate in a grid.

projects.name: Machine Learning Rain Prediction
projects.description: End-to-End ML project. The goal is to predict if the next day will rain or not. The project consists of: Exploratory Data analysis, with data cleaning and preprocessing for training. Hyper-parametrization tunning and final model training with xgboost. Then I run a small local web server with gunicorn and use flask to call the predict function. Afterwards, I containerize the scripts with docker and deploy it to AWS with Elastic Beanstalk.
